# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the paused UI.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: LocalizedStringResource
```

## Creating a resume button

- **init(title:resumeButton:)**: Creates a pause presentation with a resume button.
- **resumeButton**: The appearance of the resume button.

items.description: Creates a pause presentation with a resume button.
items.name: init(title:resumeButton:)

items.description: The appearance of the resume button.
items.name: resumeButton

title: title
